item.description:
Join us for the last hike of the season to view the brilliant fall foliage of CT... we will hike the blue trail to identify and learn about some of the trees growing in East Rock Park. From there we'll pick up the white trail to the Giant Steps and ascend to the Monument on East Rock peak. Going back, we'll follow the yellow trail along the cliffside to the English Shelter with really great views of the Mill River and Lake Whitney.

The hike will take approximately 2.5 hours. The trails are easy to moderate to difficult with a very steep and rocky section at the Giant Steps. You should be relatively healthy and physically fit to complete this hike.

To see a map of East Rock, please visit... http://www.cityofnewhaven.com/Parks/ParksInformation/media/2008EastRockMap.pdf

Or take an interactive tour... http://www.cityofnewhaven.com/Parks/ParksInformation/eastrockTour.asp#_self

The exact Meeting location will be sent to Yes RSVP's on the night prior to the event. Please note that RSVP's will close on Saturday October 20 at 12 pm.

Please bring water. Questions? To contact me, please email me on my profile page.
item.name: East Rock Hike & Tree Walk - The Monument & Giant Steps
